item.title: 联想第二季度利润下降 5
item.description: 中国联想集团周四公布的第二季度利润下降了 5%。【原文：China's Lenovo on Thursday reported a 5% drop in second-quarter profit.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行上调目标，预计到 2026 年底标准普尔 500 指数将上涨 11
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）的策略师们上调了对 S&P 500 指数在 2026 年年底的预期，这意味着该指数将比周三收盘时上涨 11.4%，理由是尽管经济低速增长，但超级大盘股科技股表现强劲，而且货币和财政背景也在改善。【原文：Barclays strategists raised their year-end 2026 expectation for the S&P 500 , implying an 11.4% gain from the benchmark's Wednesday close, citing strength in megacap technology along with an improving monetary and fiscal backdrop despite low growth.】

item.title: 中央银行在美国首次公开募股中融资 3.73 亿美元
item.description: 中央银行公司（Central Bancompany）周三在美国首次公开发行股票，募集资金 3.7333 亿美元，在私人信贷紧缩、投资者重新审视地区性银行的时期，为其首次公开发行奠定了基础。【原文：Central Bancompany raised $373.33 million in its U.S. initial public offering on Wednesday, positioning the lender for its debut during a period of renewed investor scrutiny of regional banks amid private credit jitters.】

item.title: APM 码头将在秘鲁卡亚俄港投资 5.5 亿美元
item.description: 荷兰港口运营商 APM 码头公司秘鲁分公司首席商务官 Fernando Fauche 周三表示，该公司将投资 5.5 亿美元，从 1 月份开始扩建秘鲁卡亚俄港。【原文：Dutch port operator APM Terminals will invest $550 million to expand Peru's Callao port starting in January, chief commercial officer for the company's Peru unit, Fernando Fauche, said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国最大电网运营商推进数据中心管理计划
item.description: 覆盖全球最大数据中心市场的美国电网运营商周三表示，他们计划推进一项计划，以管理巨型服务器仓库的连接，这些服务器仓库正将美国的用电量推向创纪录的高点，并增加了供应短缺的风险。【原文：Operators of the U.S. electric grid covering the world's largest data center market on Wednesday said they planned to move forward with a plan to manage the connection of the giant server warehouses that are propelling the country's power use to record highs and raising the risk of supply shortfalls.】

item.title: 美国授权向沙特和阿联酋公司出口先进的美国半导体产品
item.description: 美国商务部周三表示，它已授权向沙特阿拉伯和阿拉伯联合酋长国的两家公司出口先进的人工智能芯片，相当于35,000枚英伟达（Nvidia）Blackwell芯片。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department said on Wednesday it has authorized the export of advanced artificial intelligence chips, the equivalent of up to 35,000 Nvidia Blackwell chips, to two companies in Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates.】

item.title: 法院下令对 First Brands 欺诈指控进行独立调查
item.description: 一名美国破产法官周三下令对汽车零部件制造商 First Brands 展开独立调查，并划拨了 700 万美元预算，用于调查该公司利用第三方融资开具客户发票的欺诈指控。【原文：A U.S. bankruptcy judge on Wednesday ordered an independent investigation into auto parts maker First Brands, allocating a $7 million budget to probe allegations of fraud involving the company's use of third-party financing for customer invoices.】

item.title: Amkor 股价尾盘回升，将与 Nvidia 合作开发封装产品
item.description: 周三，在英伟达（Nvidia）的电话会议上，Amkor Technology 的股价在盘后交易中上涨超过 8%，因为这家人工智能芯片领导者的首席财务官把 Amkor 列为其计划在芯片封装方面合作的公司之一。【原文：Shares in Amkor Technology rose more than 8% in after-the-bell trading on Wednesday during Nvidia's conference call after the AI chip leader's chief financial officer named Amkor among companies it plans to work with on chip packaging.】

item.title: 特朗普考虑颁布行政命令，禁止各州制定人工智能法律
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份行政命令草案，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普正在考虑一项行政命令，该命令将通过诉讼和扣留联邦资金的方式，寻求优先适用各州有关人工智能的法律。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is considering an executive order that would seek to preempt state laws on artificial intelligence through lawsuits and by withholding federal funding, according to a draft of the order seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 华为摊牌后，美国参议员推出防止出口垄断法案
item.description: 美国参众两院两党议员周三公布了一项法案，要求商务部在发放出口许可证时创造公平竞争的环境，不得做出对一家美国公司有利而对另一家美国公司不利的决定。【原文：A bipartisan duo of U.S. senators unveiled a bill on Wednesday that directs the Commerce Department to create a level playing field when issuing export licenses and not make decisions that benefit one U.S. company over another.】

item.title: Axalta 投资方 Artisan Partners 敦促拒绝阿克苏诺贝尔的交易
item.description: 投资者 Artisan Partners 对 Axalta Coating Systems 与阿克苏诺贝尔的合并计划表示不满，该合并计划将通过全股票交易打造一个企业价值 250 亿美元的涂料行业巨头。【原文：Investor Artisan Partners is unhappy with Axalta Coating Systems' plans to combine with AkzoNobel in an all-stock deal that will create a paint industry giant with an enterprise value of $25 billion.】

item.title: 交易日：市场低迷，英伟达发布报告
item.description: 由于投资者在等待美国芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）的最新财报，周三全球股市总体平静，更广泛的波动幅度也有所缓和，但日本货币和债券的抛售压力进一步加大。【原文：Global stock markets were generally calm on Wednesday and wider measures of volatility eased as investors awaited U.S. chipmaker Nvidia's latest earnings, although selling pressure on Japan's currency and bonds intensified further.】

item.title: Yann LeCun 将离开 Meta，创办专注于高级机器智能的人工智能初创公司
item.description: Yann LeCun 是现代人工智能的创始人之一，也是 Meta Platforms 公司的关键人物，他在周三表示，他计划在今年年底离开公司，创办一家新的人工智能初创公司。【原文：Yann LeCun, one of the founding figures of modern artificial intelligence and a pivotal force at Meta Platforms , said on Wednesday he plans to leave the company at the end of the year to launch a new AI startup.】

item.title: 人工智能领军企业英伟达预测第四季度营收高于预期
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）周三预测第四季度营收将高于华尔街预期，在人工智能泡沫引发广泛担忧的背景下，该公司押注于云服务提供商对其人工智能芯片的蓬勃需求。【原文：Nvidia forecast fourth-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, betting on booming demand for its AI chips from cloud providers against the backdrop of widespread concerns of an artificial-intelligence bubble.】

item.title: Palo Alto Networks 将以 33.5 亿美元收购 Chronosphere，并上调年度预期
item.description: Palo Alto Networks 周三表示，它将以 33.5 亿美元的价格收购云管理和监控公司 Chronosphere，这家网络安全公司希望借此加强其人工智能产品。【原文：Palo Alto Networks said on Wednesday it will buy cloud management and monitoring company Chronosphere for $3.35 billion, as the cybersecurity firm looks to strengthen its AI offerings.】

item.title: 拉塔姆航空公司与智利飞行员工会达成合同协议，结束罢工
item.description: 拉塔姆航空公司（LATAM Airlines）工会周三表示，该公司与智利本土航空公司的飞行员已达成合同协议，结束了长达一周的罢工。【原文：LATAM Airlines and pilots for the carrier in its home country of Chile have reached a contract agreement, the union said on Wednesday, bringing an end to a week-long strike.】

item.title: Axalta 投资方 Artisan Partners：对阿克苏诺贝尔的交易说 "不
item.description: 投资者 Artisan Partners 在致股东的一封信中表示，对 Axalta Coating Systems 与阿克苏诺贝尔进行全股票合并的计划感到不满，该计划将创建一个企业价值 250 亿美元的涂料行业巨头。【原文：Investor Artisan Partners is unhappy with Axalta Coating Systems' plan to combine with AkzoNobel in an all-stock deal that would create a paint industry giant with an enterprise value of $25 billion, according to a letter to shareholders.】

item.title: 沙特 PIF、SITE 和微软签署谅解备忘录，探讨在沙特王国提供主权云服务
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金公共投资基金（Public Investment Fund）、沙特信息技术公司 SITE 和微软签署了一份谅解备忘录，探讨在沙特提供微软主权云服务。【原文：Saudi Arabian sovereign wealth fund the Public Investment Fund, Saudi information technology company SITE and Microsoft signed a memorandum of understanding to explore the delivery of Microsoft’s sovereign-cloud services in the kingdom, the Saudi fund said in an X post on Wednesday.】

item.title: MLB 与 Netflix、NBC 环球、ESPN 签订为期三年的媒体协议
item.description: 美国职业棒球大联盟周三宣布与 Netflix、NBCUniversal 和 ESPN 签订为期三年的媒体版权协议。【原文：Major League Baseball on Wednesday announced three-year media rights deals with Netflix , NBCUniversal and ESPN.】

item.title: 发言人称拉里-萨默斯辞去桑坦德银行顾问委员会职务
item.description: 桑坦德银行发言人周三表示，美国前财政部长拉里-萨默斯已辞去桑坦德银行国际顾问委员会主席一职。【原文：Former U.S. Treasury Secretary Larry Summers has resigned from Santander's international advisory board he currently chaired, a Santander spokesperson said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 城市机构负责人表示，以人工智能为重点的开发人员为纽约市的生活注入了活力
item.description: 纽约市经济发展公司（New York City Economic Development Corporation）总裁兼首席执行官安德鲁-金博尔（Andrew Kimball）表示，纽约市专注于人工智能的公司依靠人与人之间的互动发展壮大，这些公司正在推动写字楼的租赁，并激励工人回流纽约。【原文：New York City companies focused on artificial intelligence, which rely on human interaction to grow, are boosting office leasing and inspiring the return of workers to the city, said Andrew Kimball, president and CEO of New York City Economic Development Corporation.】

item.title: 美国获得沙特 1 万亿美元支出承诺 从核能到 F-35 战斗机
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普本周对王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼访问华盛顿表示了热烈欢迎，许多人认为这是对沙特阿拉伯实际统治者人权记录的恢复，随后沙特阿拉伯王国将其计划在美国的投资额提高到了 1 万亿美元。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's lavish welcome of Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman to Washington this week, touted by many as rehabilitation of human rights record of Saudi Arabia's de facto ruler, has been followed by the kingdom ramping up its planned U.S. investments to $1 trillion.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要显示支持结束量化紧缩政策
item.description: 周三公布的 10 月下旬政策会议的会议记录显示，美联储上个月宣布即将停止缩减资产负债表的决定比许多人预期的要早，这一决定得到了央行行长们的广泛支持，他们还表示有兴趣将央行持有的债券比重从期限较长的债券调整为国库券。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s decision last month to announce a looming halt to the drawdown of its balance sheet earlier than many had expected drew broad support from central bankers, who also expressed interest in reweighting central bank holdings from longer-dated bonds toward Treasury bills, meeting minutes from the late October policy meeting released on Wednesday said.】

item.title: Affirm 首席执行官：人工智能将重新定义购物和支付
item.description: 提供 "先买后付 "计划的 Affirm 公司首席执行官兼联合创始人马克斯-莱夫钦（Max Levchin）说，人工智能将取代人类的工作，使金融产品更加透明，从而改变购物方式。【原文：Max Levchin, CEO and co-founder of Affirm, which offers buy now, pay later plans, said artificial intelligence is poised to transform shopping by taking over human tasks and making financial products more transparent.】

item.title: 会议纪要显示，美联储在决策者对通胀持谨慎态度的情况下下调利率
item.description: 美联储10月28-29日的会议纪要周三显示，尽管决策者们警告说，降低借贷成本可能会有损于为平息四年半来一直高于美国央行2%目标的通胀率而进行的斗争，但上个月美联储仍出现了降息的分歧。【原文：A divided Federal Reserve cut interest rates last month even as policymakers cautioned that lower borrowing costs could risk undermining the fight to quell inflation that has been above the U.S. central bank's 2% target for four and a half years, the minutes from the October 28-29 meeting showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯普京呼吁成立国家人工智能工作组
item.description: 弗拉基米尔-普京总统周三呼吁成立一个国家工作组，协调俄罗斯在国产生成式人工智能模型方面的工作，他说这对维护俄罗斯主权至关重要。【原文：President Vladimir Putin on Wednesday called for a national task force to coordinate Russia's work on homegrown generative artificial intelligence models, which he said were vital to preserving Russian sovereignty.】

item.title: 诺华将在北卡罗来纳州建立生产中心，创造 700 个就业岗位
item.description: 瑞士制药公司诺华周三表示，将扩大在北卡罗来纳州的业务，并在那里建立一个生产中心，作为未来五年计划在美国基础设施投资 230 亿美元的一部分。【原文：Novartis will expand its operations in North Carolina and build a manufacturing hub there as part of a planned $23 billion of U.S. infrastructure investment over the next five years, the Swiss pharmaceuticals company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国因停摆无法收集数据而取消 10 月份就业报告
item.description: 美国劳工统计局（Bureau of Labor Statistics）周三表示，在最近结束的政府停摆阻碍了家庭调查数据的收集之后，该局将不再发布备受关注的 10 月份就业报告，而是将该月的非农就业数据与 11 月份的报告合并发布。【原文：The U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics said on Wednesday it would not be publishing the closely watched employment report for October, but will combine nonfarm payrolls for that month with November's report after the recently ended government shutdown prevented the collection of data for the household survey.】

item.title: 独家报道官员称特朗普的半导体关税计划可能推迟
item.description: 美国官员私下表示，他们可能不会很快征收承诺已久的半导体关税，这可能会推迟唐纳德-特朗普总统经济议程的核心内容。【原文：U.S. officials are privately saying that they might not levy long-promised semiconductor tariffs soon, potentially delaying a centerpiece of President Donald Trump’s economic agenda.】

item.title: 华纳音乐与人工智能公司 Udio 达成和解，计划建立联合平台
item.description: 华纳音乐集团（Warner Music Group）周三表示，已与人工智能公司 Udio 就版权侵权案达成和解，双方将联合推出一个新的人工智能歌曲创作平台。【原文：Warner Music Group has settled a copyright infringement case with artificial intelligence company Udio and will jointly launch a new platform for AI song creation, the companies said on Wednesday.】
